alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 11:41PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Gusty Winds And Blowing Snow Over Highway Summits This Weekend... Northeast winds will increase Friday night and persist into the weekend over higher elevations of the Steese, Elliott, and Dalton Highways. Wind gusts up to 40 mph combined with loose snow on the ground will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will likely be reduced and may result in difficult travel conditions along highway sections above treeline. This includes Gobblers Knob and Finger Mountain on the Dalton Highway, Eagle and Twelvemile Summits on the Steese Highway, and Ptarmigan Pass on the Elliott Highway.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
